text_logic_form: The triangles $PQM$ and $PQR$ are similar to each other.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangles $PQM$ and $PQR$ are similar to each other.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $QP$ is $13$ units.
The length of the line $QM$ is $12$ units.
Point $M$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $P$.
The line connecting $Q$ and $R$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $Q$ and $P$.
The line connecting $Q$ and $M$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $R$ and $M$.
line_instances: There are lines $PM$, $QM$, and $QP$, forming the triangle $PQM$.
There are lines $QP$, $QR$, and $RP$, forming the triangle $PQR$.
